attributes.action: Stop plans to honour Donald Trump with planned June state visit
attributes.additional_details: As a representative of the British people the UK parliament supports the rights of legal immigration, freedom to express sexual orientation, the rights of women to terminate pregnancy with due reason, the reduction of gun ownership, free trade and reduction of unilateral military agression in sovereign states. Non of these values are supported by the current US administration.
attributes.background: Donald Trump is to be honoured by our government this June. The planned state visit is entirely inappropriate as Mr Trump’s government does not support or represent the values of the majority of the British public.
